content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type =="email_delivery"
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on DateTime step 1d by Direction
content.title: Email Traffic

content.query:
let min_t = toscalar(
    MimecastCG 
    | where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(RejectionType)
    | extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
    | extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp)) 
    | summarize min_time = min(DateTime)
    | extend min_t = iff(isempty(min_time),now(),min_time)
    | project min_t);
MimecastCG 
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(RejectionType) 
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp)) 
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on DateTime from min_t to now() step 1d by tostring(RejectionType) 
| project-away DateTime 
| extend Count = array_sum(Trend) 
| project ['Rejection Type'] = RejectionType, Count, ['Spark Line'] = Trend 
| order by Count desc
content.title: Rejections

content.query:
let min_t = toscalar(
    MimecastCG 
    | where Type == "email_delivery" and isnotempty(RejectionType)
    | extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
    | extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp)) 
    | summarize min_time = min(DateTime)
    | extend min_t = iff(isempty(min_time),now(),min_time)
    | project min_t);
MimecastCG 
| where Type == "email_delivery" and isnotempty(RejectionType)
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp)) 
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on DateTime from min_t to now() step 1d by tostring(RejectionType) 
| project-away DateTime 
| extend Count = array_sum(Trend) 
| project ['Rejection Type'] = RejectionType, Count, ['Spark Line'] = Trend 
| order by Count desc
content.title: Delivery Failures

content.query:
let min_t = toscalar(
    MimecastCG
    | where Type == "email_process" and isnotempty(HoldReason)
    | extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
    | extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
    | summarize min_time = min(DateTime)
    | extend min_t = iff(isempty(min_time),now(),min_time)
    | project min_t);
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_process" and isnotempty(HoldReason)
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from min_t to now() step 1d by tostring(HoldReason)
| project-away TimeGenerated
| extend Count=array_sum(Trend)
| project ['Hold Reason']=HoldReason, Count,['Spark Line'] = Trend
| order by Count desc
content.title: Held

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt"
| summarize  count() by Direction, Action, SenderIp
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_
content.title: Total Messages Received

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt"
| where Action in~ ("Acc", "RTY")
| summarize  count() by Direction, Action, SenderIp
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_

//Acc and Rty are considered as delivered
content.title: Total Messages Accepted

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt"
| where Action in~ ("REJ", "BNC")
| summarize  count() by Direction, Action, SenderIp
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_

// Rej and Bnc are considered as blocked
content.title: Total Messages Rejected

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "RTY")
| where isempty(TlsVersion)
| summarize  count() by Direction, Action, SenderIp
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_

//Acc and Rty are considered as delivered
content.title: Total Messages Accepted without TLS

content.json: ðŸ’¡ To view message details, please click on any of the tiles above

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt"
| project  
['Aggregate ID'] = AggregateId,
['Processing ID'] = ProcessingId,
['Account ID'] = AccountId,
['Action'] = Action,
['Type'] = Type,
['Sender Envelope'] = SenderEnvelope,
['Message ID'] = MessageId,
['Subject'] = Subject,
['Recipients'] = Recipients,
['Sender IP'] = SenderIp,
['Rejection Type'] = RejectionType,
['Rejection Code'] = RejectionCode,
['Direction'] = Direction,
['Number Attachments'] = NumberAttachments,
['Sender Header'] = SenderHeader,
['Rejection Info'] = RejectionInfo,
['TLS Version'] = TlsVersion,
['TLS Cipher'] = TlsCipher,
['Spam Info'] = SpamInfo,
['Spam Processing Detail'] = SpamProcessingDetail,
['Virus Found'] = VirusFound,
['Timestamp'] = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp)),
['Sub Type'] = Subtype
content.title: Messages Received

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "RTY")
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on DateTime step 1d by Direction
content.title: Messages Accepted by Route

content.query:
//Acc and Rty are considered as delivered

MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "RTY") and isnotempty( SenderIp)
| extend senderGeoDetails = geo_info_from_ip_address(SenderIp)
| extend latitude = senderGeoDetails.latitude, longitude = senderGeoDetails.longitude, country = senderGeoDetails.country, state = senderGeoDetails.state, city = senderGeoDetails.city
| where isnotempty(latitude) and isnotempty(longitude)
| extend label = strcat(city,", ",state,", ",country)
| summarize  count() by tostring(latitude), tostring(longitude), label
content.title: Messages Accepted by Source Country

content.query:
//REJ and BNC are considered as delivered

MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("REJ", "BNC") and isnotempty( SenderIp)
| extend senderGeoDetails = geo_info_from_ip_address(SenderIp)
| extend latitude = senderGeoDetails.latitude, longitude = senderGeoDetails.longitude, country = senderGeoDetails.country, state = senderGeoDetails.state, city = senderGeoDetails.city
| where isnotempty(latitude) and isnotempty(longitude)
| extend label = strcat(city,", ",state,", ",country)
| summarize  count() by tostring(latitude), tostring(longitude), label
content.title: Messages Rejected by Source Country

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered == "true"
| summarize  count() by Direction , Delivered , DestinationIp , TlsUsed 
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_
content.title: Total Messages Delivered

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered ==  "false"  and Direction == "Outbound"
| summarize  count() by Direction , Delivered  , TlsUsed 
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_
content.title: Total Outbound Delivery Failures

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered == "false" and Direction == "Inbound"
| summarize  count() by Direction , Delivered , DestinationIp , TlsUsed 
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_
content.title: Total Inbound Delivery Failures

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered == "true" and TlsUsed == "No"
| summarize  count() by Direction , Delivered , DestinationIp , TlsUsed 
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_
content.title: Total Messages Delivered without TLS

    ["Processing ID"] = ProcessingId,
    ["Delivered"] = Delivered,
    ["Destination IP"] = DestinationIp,
    ["Hostname"] = Hostname,
    ["Delivery Attempts"] = DeliveryAttempts,
    ["TLS Used"] = TlsUsed,
    ["Route"] = Route,
    ["Account ID"] = AccountId,
    ["Timestamp"] = Timestamp,
    ["Sender Envelope"] = SenderEnvelope,
    ["Message ID"] = MessageId,
    ["Subject"] = Subject,
    ["Total Size Attachments"] = TotalSizeAttachments,

    ["Delivery Errors"] = DeliveryErrors,
    ["Rejection Type"] = RejectionType,
    ["Rejection Code"] = RejectionCode,
    ["Rejection Info"] = RejectionInfo

| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1) 
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on DateTime step 1d by Direction

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered == "true" and Direction == "Outbound"
| summarize Count = count() by Direction , Delivered , DestinationIp , TlsUsed 
| extend geo_info = geo_info_from_ip_address(DestinationIp)
| extend latitude = geo_info.latitude, longitude = geo_info.longitude, country = geo_info.country , state = geo_info.state , city = geo_info.state
| where isnotempty(latitude) and isnotempty(longitude)
| extend label = strcat(city,", ",state,", ",country)
content.title: Messages Delivered Outbound by Destination Country

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type =="email_antivirus"
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on DateTime step 1d by Route
content.title: Anti-Virus Traffic

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "Rty") and RejectionType =="Virus Signature Detection"
| summarize count()
content.title: Total Viruses Rejected

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty( SpamInfo) and SpamInfo != "[]"
| summarize count()
content.title: Total Messages Rejected as Spam

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_process" and HoldReason == "Spm"
| summarize count()
content.title: Total Messages Held as Spam

content.json: ðŸ’¡ To view message details, please click on any of the tiles above

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "Rty") and RejectionType =="Virus Signature Detection"
| project  ["Aggregate ID"] = AggregateId, ["Recipients"] = Recipients, ["Action"] = Action, ["Timestamp"] = Timestamp, ["Sender Envelope"] = SenderEnvelope, ["Message ID"] = MessageId, ["Subject"] = Subject, ["Number of Attachments"] = NumberAttachments, ["Type"] = Type, ["Subtype"] = Subtype, ["Offset"] = Offset, ["Partition"] = Partition, ["Sender IP"] = SenderIp, ["Direction"] = Direction, ["Sender Header"] = SenderHeader, ["TLS Version"] = TlsVersion, ["TLS Cipher"] = TlsCipher, ["Spam Info"] = SpamInfo,["Virus Found"] = VirusFound, ["Spam Processing Detail"] = SpamProcessingDetail, ["Rejection Type"] = RejectionType, ["Rejection Code"] = RejectionCode, ["Rejection Info"] = RejectionInfo, ["Processing ID"] = ProcessingId, ["Account ID"] = AccountId
content.title: Viruses Rejected

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(SpamInfo) and SpamInfo != "[]"
| project  ["Aggregate ID"] = AggregateId, ["Processing ID"] = ProcessingId,["Recipients"] = Recipients, ["Action"] = Action, ["Timestamp"] = Timestamp, ["Sender Envelope"] = SenderEnvelope, ["Message ID"] = MessageId, ["Subject"] = Subject, ["Number of Attachments"] = NumberAttachments, ["Type"] = Type, ["Subtype"] = Subtype, ["Offset"] = Offset, ["Partition"] = Partition, ["Sender IP"] = SenderIp, ["Direction"] = Direction, ["Sender Header"] = SenderHeader, ["TLS Version"] = TlsVersion, ["TLS Cipher"] = TlsCipher, ["Spam Info"] = SpamInfo,["Virus Found"] = VirusFound, ["Spam Processing Detail"] = SpamProcessingDetail, ["Rejection Type"] = RejectionType, ["Rejection Code"] = RejectionCode, ["Rejection Info"] = RejectionInfo,  ["Account ID"] = AccountId
content.title: Messages Rejected as Spam

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_process" and HoldReason == "Spm"
| project   ["Aggregate ID"] = AggregateId, ["Processing ID"] = ProcessingId,  ["Account ID"] = AccountId, ["Action"] = Action, ["Timestamp"] = Timestamp, ["Sender Envelope"] = SenderEnvelope, ["Message ID"] = MessageId, ["Subject"] = Subject, ["Total Size of Attachments"] = TotalSizeAttachments, ["Number of Attachments"] = NumberAttachments, ["Email Size"] = EmailSize, ["Type"] = Type, ["Subtype"] = Subtype, ["Offset"] = Offset, ["Partition"] = Partition,["Hold Reason"] = HoldReason
content.title: Messages Held as Spam

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(VirusFound)
| summarize Count = count() by SenderEnvelope , Recipients , SenderIp,VirusFound , Timestamp
| sort by Count desc
| extend Sender = SenderEnvelope , Recipient =  Recipients , ["Source IP"] = SenderIp, ["Virus Name"] = VirusFound, Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| project Sender, Recipient, ["Source IP"], ["Virus Name"], Count ,Timestamp = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| extend Count = iff(isnull(Count), 0, Count)
content.title: Messages Rejected Due to Virus

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(SpamInfo) and SpamInfo != "[]"
| summarize Count = count() by SenderEnvelope , Recipients , SenderIp,SpamInfo , Timestamp
| sort by Count desc
| extend Sender = SenderEnvelope , Recipient =  Recipients , ["Source IP"] = SenderIp, ["Spam Information"]  = SpamInfo, Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| project Sender, Recipient, ["Source IP"], ["Spam Information"], Count , Timestamp =  todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| extend Count = iff(isnull(Count), 0, Count)
content.title: Messages Rejected as Spam

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered == "true" and isnotnull(TlsUsed)
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on DateTime step 1d by TlsUsed
content.title: TLS Delivery

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered== "true" and isnotempty(TlsVersion)
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| summarize Count = count(Recipients) by bin(DateTime , 1d), TlsVersion
content.title: TLS Versions (Delivery)

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(TlsVersion)
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| summarize Count = count(Recipients) by bin(DateTime , 1d), TlsVersion
content.title: TLS Versions (Receipt)

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and isnotempty(TlsCipher)
| summarize count() by Cipher = TlsCipher 
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Delivery Ciphers

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(TlsCipher)
| summarize count() by Cipher = TlsCipher 
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Receipt Ciphers

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and TlsUsed == "No" and Delivered == "true"
| extend temp = split(Recipients, "@")
| extend ["Recipient Domain"] = tostring(temp[1])
| summarize Count = count() by ["Recipient Domain"] 
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Recipient Domains not Using TLS

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and  Action in~ ("Acc", "Rty")  and isempty(TlsVersion)
| extend temp = split(SenderEnvelope, "@")
| extend ["Sending Domain"] = tostring(temp[1])
| summarize Count = count() by ["Sending Domain"] 
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Sending Domains not Using TLS

content.query:
MimecastDLP
| extend EventTime = coalesce(todatetime(EventTime), now() - 15d)
| summarize count() by Action, bin(EventTime, 1d)
content.title: Data Leak Prevention Events

content.query:
MimecastDLP
| summarize count() by Route
content.title: DLP Events by Route

content.query:
MimecastDLP
| extend EventTime = coalesce(todatetime(EventTime), now() - 15d)
| summarize count() by Action, bin(EventTime, 1h)
content.title: DLP Events by Actions Triggered

content.query:
MimecastDLP
| summarize count() by Policy
content.title: DLP Events by Policies Triggered

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_iep"
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on DateTime step 1d by Route
content.title: Internal Email Protection by Route

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_iep"
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend Timestamp = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| project
    ['Aggregate ID'] = AggregateId,
    ['Processing ID'] = ProcessingId,
    ['Account ID'] = AccountId,
    Type,
    Timestamp,
    ['Sender Envelope'] = SenderEnvelope,
    Subject,
    Recipients,
    ['Url Category'] = UrlCategory,
    ['Scan Results'] = ScanResults,
    Route,
    ['Message ID'] = MessageId,
    ['Monitored Domain Source'] = MonitoredDomainSource,
    ['Similar Domain'] =SimilarDomain,
    ['Sub Type'] = Subtype
content.title: Internal Event Protection Events

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_journal"
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on DateTime step 1d by Direction
content.title: Journal Messages by Direction

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_journal"
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend Timestamp = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| project
    ['Aggregate ID'] = AggregateId,
    ['Processing ID'] = ProcessingId,
    ['Account ID'] = AccountId,
    Type,
    Timestamp,
    ['Sender Envelope'] = SenderEnvelope,
    Recipients,
    Direction,
    ['Sub Type'] = Subtype
content.title: Journal Message Events

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type =="email_spam" and isnotempty(Route)
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend DateTime = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on DateTime step 1d by Route
content.title: Spam Messages by Route

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_spam"
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(toint(Timestamp), 1)
| extend Timestamp = todatetime(unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(Timestamp))
| project
    ['Aggregate ID'] = AggregateId,
    ['Processing ID'] = ProcessingId,
    ['Account ID'] = AccountId,
    Type,
    Timestamp,
    ['Sender Envelope'] = SenderEnvelope,
    Subject,
    Recipients,
    ['Sender IP'] = SenderIp,
    ['Sender Domain'] = SenderDomain,
    ['Sender Header'] = SenderHeader,
    Route,
    ['Sub Type'] = Subtype
content.title: Spam Message Events

content.query:
//Acc and Rty are considered as delivered

MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_spam" and isnotempty(SenderIp)
| extend senderGeoDetails = geo_info_from_ip_address(SenderIp)
| extend latitude = senderGeoDetails.latitude, longitude = senderGeoDetails.longitude, country = senderGeoDetails.country, state = senderGeoDetails.state, city = senderGeoDetails.city
| where isnotempty(latitude) and isnotempty(longitude)
| extend label = strcat(city,", ",state,", ",country)
| summarize  count() by tostring(latitude), tostring(longitude), label
content.title: Spam Messages by Source Country
